app.description: App to chat via AI chatbot with structured documents like product manuals
app.title: Chat With Manuals

conversation.language-alert: Please use {language, select, es {Spanish} en {English} other {Unknown}} in this conversation as the document is indexed in this language.

edit-document-modal.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.

form-errors.name-min-length: Name must be at least 3 characters long
